snippet.title: CycleNav
snippet.description: Schwinn may sound like a company straight out of Wayne's World, but its CycleNav looks fun. For $59.99, you get a simple navigator that does a straightforward job.

snippet.title: A2B Alva+ electric bicycle
snippet.description: With 500W of electric assistance, the A2B Alva+ is an effortlessly quick commuter, but its cumbersome weight can be a problem when dismounted.

snippet.title: Bike-mounted 3D printer turns trash into twinkling tokens
snippet.description: In Taipei, a group of young design enthusiasts have kitted out a bike with a computer and 3D printer to turn plastic waste into something useful -- and fun.

snippet.title: SkyCycle puts London bike paths in the clouds
snippet.description: A revolutionary proposal to transform London's cycling infrastructure would place wide bike paths above the city's rail network.

snippet.title: Stolen bike rescued with bike-powered angle grinder
snippet.description: When a stolen bike was located tightly locked up, a group of bicyclists used their own leg power to free it.

snippet.title: Tiger's finest versus Speedway bike
snippet.description: One-off cars are always going to be fun -- especially when they're built in a shed in the east of England and can hit 62mph from rest in less than 3 seconds. It's also fun to put them on sand up against a Speedway rider. As you do.

snippet.title: Take a ride on the Smart Electric Bike
snippet.description: The 2013 Frankfurt auto show is filled with cars, both production and concept, but nothing could prepare us for Smart's electric bicycle. CNET's Antuan Goodwin takes it for a spin and tells us why this could be a smart, no pun intended, way to travel.

snippet.title: LED bike frames glow with inner light
snippet.description: Phantom Frames on Kickstarter create glowing kids' bikes that will be the envy of the neighborhood.

snippet.title: Paperdude VR combines Oculus Rift and bike-riding
snippet.description: Globacore aims to reinvent museum exhibits and more with Oculus Rift: their take on the classic game Paperboy uses Oculus VR goggles and a bike, and we gave it a dizzying ride.

snippet.title: Morpher folding bike helmet packs down flat
snippet.description: Bike helmets could become a lot more convenient with the packable folding Morpher helmet on Indiegogo.
